response: given your worsening symptoms after starting antibiotics - increased swelling, color change to purple, developing a fever, and feeling generally sluggish - it's advisable that you return to urgent care or emergency services immediately. these symptoms could be indicative of a spreading infection, which requires urgent medical attention, especially in pregnancy. general rule of thumb is to seek medical attention immediately when condition worsens after starting antibiotics. also, while mild swelling is expected after an infection, doubling in size and discoloration are not. be sure to let your doctor know you're pregnant, as this could affect treatment options.
